data.title: David Bondi
data.text:
President, Informa China and COO APAC

David Bondi is Chief Operating Officer for the Informa Markets Division, Asia Pacific and President of Informa China. His role comprises of managing and growing a portfolio of exhibitions in China and across the Asia Pacific region from the centralised Informa Markets Shanghai office.

Recently, this office has welcomed several leading exhibitions into its portfolio in focus markets such as Construction & Decoration, Health Food and Ingredients, whilst continuing to expand its world leading portfolio of events serving the Beauty industry. David was previously responsible for Informaâ€™s range of beauty events, including Beyond Beauty, Paris and Bangkok, as well as the China Beauty Expo in Shanghai. David has accumulated over 25 years of experience in the industry, with a focus on handling outbound sales, organising meetings and exhibitions around the world. David graduated from the INSEEC Paris Business School in 1991.
